de.gtarc.chariot.connectionapi.impl

Class WebClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gtarc.chariot.connectionapi.impl.AbstractConnectionImpl
      • de.gtarc.chariot.connectionapi.impl.WebClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractConnection, Connection, DeviceConnection, HumanConnection, ServerConnection, URIBasedConnection

    public class WebClientConnection
extends AbstractConnectionImpl
implements DeviceConnection, URIBasedConnection
    A simple HTTP client implementation, which is based on Jetty Http client.
    Author:
    cemakpolat
